item.title: Seminar talk and discussion with Daniela Rosner
item.dc:creator: Alex Taylor
item.description:
I’m really thrilled to have Daniela Rosner visiting us at the Centre for Human-Computer Interaction Design (HCID), and especially excited about her HCID seminar talk. She’ll be expanding on ideas from her book “Critical Fabulations: Reworking the Methods and Margins of Design”, and Ann Light will acting as discussant. For details see this Eventbrite page [...]

Read More... from Seminar talk and discussion with Daniela Rosner

The post Seminar talk and discussion with Daniela Rosner appeared first on Alex Taylor.
item.content:encoded:
I’m really thrilled to have Daniela Rosner visiting us at the Centre for Human-Computer Interaction Design (HCID), and especially excited about her HCID seminar talk. She’ll be expanding on ideas from her book “Critical Fabulations: Reworking the Methods and Margins of Design”, and Ann Light will acting as discussant. For details see this Eventbrite page

Thrilled to have @danielarosner giving our @cityuni_hcid seminar talk on 23 July: “Why Fabulate Design?” — A seminar talk and discussion with Daniela Rosner.https://t.co/ygmwZAFQ3c

— Alex Taylor (@alxndrt) June 25, 2018

The post Seminar talk and discussion with Daniela Rosner appeared first on Alex Taylor.
